item.description:
INTRODUCTORY MARKETING COMMUNICATIONS SEMINAR OFFERED

Craig Milner Design, LLC will be offering an introductory seminar on marketing communications at the Blackstone Valley Business Center in Whitinsville (just off Route 146 South) this month.

The session is scheduled for Tuesday evening, March 27, from 7-9 p.m.

The course will cover company and product positioning, how to use your website as a primary communications tool, and identifying promotional opportunities for PR and publicity. It will also cover advertising, sales material, email marketing campaigns, and how these can all work together.

The cost is $49 per person, and course materials will be provided. For further information or to register, please contact Craig Milner at 508.853.3300.

mailto:craig@craigmilnerdesign.com

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: INTRODUCTORY MARKETING COMMUNICATIONS SEMINAR OFFERED
